testsuite.name: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the assignment "Password with Invisibility"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And I set the password authorization checkbox to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And I set the assignment password to be "something"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And I set the assignment visibility checkbox to false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the policies page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: Then I save it anyway
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Password with Invisibility" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: When I edit the "Password with Invisibility" assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: Then The assignment password is "something"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: And The assignment visibility checkbox is false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously.
